Affiliate Disclosure

Last Updated: February 16, 2026

At GlowPicked, transparency is one of our core values. We want you to know exactly how we operate and how we earn money so you can trust our reviews and recommendations.

The Honest Truth About Our Affiliate Relationships

üí∞ Yes, We Earn Commissions

When you purchase a product through one of our links, we may earn a small commission from the retailer (typically 1-10% of the purchase price). This doesn't cost you anything extra - it's how retailers pay us for sending customers their way.

ü§ñ Our Research Process Is Transparent

We do NOT buy or physically test products. Instead, we use AI tools to research Amazon customer reviews and present honest recommendations based on what real buyers say. This means our insights are based on thousands of real human experiences ‚Äî not just one person's opinion. Our systems prioritize product quality over profit potential.

How Our Review Process Actually Works

We pick products based on high ratings and positive customer reviews ‚Äî not commission rates.

Our Affiliate Partners

Amazon Associates

As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.

We participate in the Amazon Associates Program. When you click on an Amazon product link and make a purchase, we earn a small commission (typically 1-10% depending on the product category).

Beauty Products: ~4-8% commission

Direct Brand Partnerships

We may occasionally partner directly with beauty brands for affiliate commissions. Any such relationships will be clearly disclosed in the specific review.

Varies by brand: 2-15% commission

Legal Requirements & Compliance

FTC Guidelines

We comply with Federal Trade Commission (FTC) guidelines regarding affiliate disclosures. The FTC requires that we clearly and conspicuously disclose our affiliate relationships.

Canadian Regulations

As a Canadian-operated website, we also comply with Competition Bureau Canada guidelines for advertising and affiliate marketing disclosure requirements.

Ongoing Compliance

We regularly review our disclosure practices to ensure compliance with evolving regulations in both the United States and Canada.

Questions About Our Affiliate Relationships?

Q: Do you only review products with affiliate programs?

A: No. We review products based on user interest and scientific merit. If a great product doesn't have an affiliate program, we'll still review it honestly and link to it without earning a commission.

Q: Are your negative reviews fake to make positive ones seem more credible?

A: Absolutely not. We publish negative analysis because data shows products genuinely disappoint reviewers. We include this to save you money and maintain credibility.

Q: How do I know which links are affiliate links?

A: We clearly mark affiliate links and include disclosure statements at the top of every article. When in doubt, assume any product link earns us a commission.

Q: Can I support your work without buying through affiliate links?

A: Yes! Share our articles with friends, follow us on social media, and subscribe to our newsletter. Word-of-mouth recommendations help us grow more than commissions.

Still Have Questions?

If you have any questions about our affiliate relationships, review process, or business model, we're happy to answer them. Transparency is important to us.
